metadata.title: CVE-2024-48991 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - high
metadata.description:
Qualys discovered that needrestart, before version 3.8, allows localattackers to execute arbitrary code as root by winning a race conditionand tricking needrestart into running their own, fake Python interpreter(instead of the system's real Python interpreter).

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-48991` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

needrestart - 3.6-8ubuntu4.2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: needrestart package in oracular was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '3.6-8ubuntu4.2').
